channel.title: I need help with shops
channel.description: hey guys well my server is being wack and not letting me buy item or sell items to shops. can any 1 help me with this? how would i do it. and if there is a guide please post it

item.title: I need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Well, do you want a cake? flowers? gold madel?
Running is not hard but to run with style is a compition.

goodluck with your server, I wish you the best.

item.title: I need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Your running a server and do not know how to xml edit? That will result in A closed server.
anyway it might be that you don’t have updated the item.rscd in the client or if your shop doesn’t sell that kind of items.
If you use the ‘‘pot seller’’ you can’t just try selling him a r2h.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

If you changed the basepraice of the items in your server, you need todo it via Items.rscd client side too. Thats probally why it wont let you buy anything form your shops.

Read full topic
